rows.label: qev018201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, it's you! How's that battle probe treating you?
I hope you're being smart about how you use it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_JNK0010
rows.name: Thank

rows.label: qev018201_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Hugo that it has been a lifesaver.

rows.label: qev018201_JNK0020
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev018201_SEL0021
rows.name: Act totally unimpressed.

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0002
rows.name:
No thanks needed. At first, my work was for the sake
of the Earthlife Colonization Project, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0003
rows.name:
But now it's for the city and the BLADEs,
so compliments mean nothing to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0004
rows.name:
My only desire is for those stubborn idiots in the arms
industry to wake up and take notice, and I need your
help for that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Regardless, the design for my next type of battle probe
is ready to go into production. This series generates
a melee attack boost effect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0006
rows.name:
The specs call for 15,000 units of miranium.
Think you can handle it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0007
rows.name:
Your cynicism is overwhelming. How do you manage to
sleep at night with such an outlook?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Unless... Wait, are you serious?
Is it really not useful in the field?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0009
rows.name:
B-but that means those stubborn goons in the
arms industry were right all along...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0010
rows.name:
N-no. I refuse to believe it. And I'll PROVE that I'm
right with my next type of battle probe! This series
generates a melee attack boost effect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0011
rows.name:
She's ready to go into production, just as soon as I get
15,000 units of miranium. I swear you'll be impressed
this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0012
rows.name: Right then. Get on that soon as you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0013
rows.name:
And I've got even more designs for different types of
battle probes where these came from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0014
rows.name: Can't afford to get stuck here, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0016
rows.name:
If you set a melee attack probe at a FrontierNav
probe site, any BLADEs fighting in that region will
have their melee attack power increased.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Want to give it a try? Perhaps right away?
Of course you do. So get out there and find me
that blasted miranium![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0018
rows.name: Everything's set to go. I just need the miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Are you ready to blow the doors open on a new
combat paradigm? Well, that miranium is the key,
so gimme![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_JNK0030
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev018201_SEL0031
rows.name: Hand over 15,000 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_JNK0040
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev018201_SEL0041
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0020
rows.name: All right, sit tight. I'll whip this up in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0021
rows.name:
With one of these puppies activated, BLADEs will be
able to take on more powerful enemies like it's nothing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Oh, it's beautiful. I'm a proud papa over here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Behold, a new series of battle probesâ€”
the melee attack probe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Install one of these bad boys in a FrontierNav data
probe site, and BLADEs fighting in that region will see
their melee attack power boosted to extreme levels.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Go on, give it a whirl. Go punch something huge.
And have fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0026
rows.name:
In the meantime, I'll get to work prepping my next
design.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0027
rows.name:
Come see me when you have a moment. If you've got
the miranium, I'll make your combat dreams come true![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Oh, come now! Do you want me to dance for you?
Is that it? Because I will. I absolutely will.
And trust me, you do NOT want to see that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018201_MSG0029
rows.name:
So hurry up and give me that miranium so I can build
my melee attack probe![ST:wait ]
